snippet: After 17 years reporting on Paraguay’s drug trade, Cándido Figueredo has bodyguards on his porch and a handgun always within reach — a natural response to constant death threats.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Candido Figueredo, correspondent for ABC Color, Paraguay's main newspaper, in Pedro Juan Caballero, border outpost known as a nerve center for drug trafficking and gunrunning; for more than 16 years Figueredo, who has exposed countless drug secrets, has lived like a prisoner in his own home, with the national police providing 24-hour security service.
lead_paragraph: After 17 years reporting on Paraguay’s drug trade, Cándido Figueredo has bodyguards on his porch and a handgun always within reach — a natural response to constant death threats.

headline.seo: Scourge of Paraguay’s Drug Trade, the Journalist Cándido Figueredo, Is Ready for Retaliation
headline.main: Exposing Drug Secrets, From a Well-Guarded Bunker
headline.print_headline: Exposing Drug Secrets, From a Well-Guarded Bunker
